main.name: Gregory Mujica
main.description: Full Stack React and Node developer (MERN)
main.bio: I’m a full stack web developer with extensive knowledge in frontend development. Extensive knowledge in Javascript, firebase, MongoDB (mongoose), Css Frameworks as, ReactJS, NodeJS. Experience with development under the Agile Scrum Methodology.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

work.title: Frontend Developer
work.description: Frontend developer assigned to the ODC project (the origination of credit cards), System developed for the registration and consultation of financial data of customers through their ID to different credit institutions throughout Peru, this system allows to speed up the evaluation process and CENCOSUD credit card allocation to different bank customers. Place assigned: Development offices of Cencosud Bank Technologies used: ReactJS, Redux, Axios, Material-UI, Git, Azure DevOps, SonarQube (Code Scan), GitLab.

work.title: Functional analyst - QA / Analista Funcional - QA
work.description: Prepare the functional analysis of new applications for different organizations, as well as update and improve existing ones; that is, it must control, analyze and supervise the functional development of computer applications, ensuring their correct exploitation and optimal performance. Development of diagrams of operations and design of applications at the level of mockups. Currently, the service offered is for the Tgestiona Company and in turn the assigned projects of Telefonica of Perú Technologies used: Lucidchart (development of diagrams and mockups), Figma (development of mockups), Office tools (Word, Excel, PowerPoint), Agile Scrum methodology.

work.title: Frontend Developer
work.description: Developer Frontend in the project: The Money Table, development and layout of screens. Web system for remittance auctions (Dollars and Soles). Technologies used: HTML, CSS, Javascript, Git.

work.title: Frontend Developer
work.description: Frontend developer, development of App for the quotation of the terrestrial, aerial, maritime ticket and tourist packages. with the ReactJS framework together with the MaterialUI library, under the Scrum development methodology. Technologies used: Javascript, ReactJS, HTML / CSS, Redux, Git, Material-UI.

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: Development of modules and support of the CRM Brainy App. Technologies used: Framework Bootstrap 3, Javascript, PostgreSQL, Apache, PHP.

work.title: Project Leader / Full stack developer
work.description: The general leadership of the development department, the leadership of the POS project, developer in the other projects under development in the department. Technologies used: Yii2 Framework (PHP), Enyo Framework (Javascript), OpenBravo (ERP), Java, Nginx (Creation and configuration of servers), Ubuntu Server (Creation and configuration of servers), Apache Tomcat, Postgresql, CSS, MVC development , Jquery.

projects.title: Proyect Ticket Manager
projects.category: A simple task ticket management tool developed to support the management of a project using agile methodologies such as Scrum.

projects.title: COVID-19 Tracker
projects.category: A simple App for monitoring COVID-19 cases worldwide.

projects.title: Github Jobs
projects.category: A simple application that consumes the github jobs api and performs searches built with ReactJS and Hooks

projects.title: React Fitebase Chat
projects.category: A simple chat app built with ReactJS and Firebase

projects.title: Express Authentication API
projects.category: A simple authentication API developed with nodeJS (Express Framework), MongoDB Atlas with Mongoose for the development of the database system. It also implements security and sessions already started. All this implemented with JWT (Json Web Token)

projects.title: Express CRUD API
projects.category: A simple CRUD (Create, Read, Update and Delete) API developed with nodeJS (Express Framework), MongoDB Atlas with Mongoose for the development of the database system.

projects.title: Omnifood
projects.category: A simple web page for food delivery app

testimonials.text: Imagination is more important than knowledge. For knowledge is limited, whereas imagination embraces the entire world, stimulating progress, giving birth to evolution.
The greatest enemy of knowledge is not ignorance, it is the illusion of knowledge.
When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.
